item.title: Installing Go on OS X
item.author: alberto@albertogrespan.com (Alberto Grespan)
item.description: tl;dr this are my notes for installing Go (Golang) on OS X using hombrew, adding command completions on ZSH, a single GOPATH and all around clean install. Today we’ll install the Go programming language and dependencies using OS X Homebrew. Keep in mind that this is an specific OS X installation. If you need to install Go on Ubuntu you can follow this guide, after that you can just go on with this tutorial.
